meanings.definition: The quality or state of being egocentric.
meanings.sent1: Her egocentricity made it difficult for her to consider other people's feelings.
meanings.sent2: His constant focus on himself showed his egocentricity.
meanings.sent3: Despite his egocentricity, he still managed to make friends.
meanings.sent4: The egocentricity of the cat was evident as it only cared about its own needs.
meanings.sent5: The egocentricity of the toddler was amusing as he believed the world revolved around him.
